SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Account
Represents a general account with basic attributes such as accountId, username, and password.
AccountManager
Manages the creation, linking, and validation of accounts.
AssignmentFrame
AssignmentFrame is a graphical user interface frame designed for parents to set or edit tasks for their child's account.
AwardFrame
AwardFrame is a graphical user interface frame designed for parents to give awards to their child's account.
BalanceManagementFrame
The BalanceManagementFrame class is responsible for managing the balance and savings of a child's account.
BigButton
This class represents a custom JButton with rounded corners and custom colors.
ChildAccount
Represents a child's account with specific attributes and methods.
DataManager
Manages the data persistence and retrieval for accounts using JSON files.
DepositFrame
The DepositFrame class provides a user interface for depositing money into a child's account.
EncouragementFrame
This class represents a frame for daily encouragement for kids.
GoalFrame
GoalFrame is a graphical user interface frame designed for setting or editing savings goals for a child's account.
HistoryFrame
HistoryFrame is a JFrame that displays and manages the transaction history for a child account.
KidDetailsFrame
A frame that displays detailed information about a child's account, including their saving goals and tasks.
KidPageFrame
This class represents a template frame for kid pages.
KidsListManagementFrame
The ChildAccountManagementFrame serves as a graphical user interface for parents to manage their list of child accounts.
KidUserCenterFrame
This class represents the user center frame for kids.
Main
The entry point of the application.
MainFrame
The main frame of the application where users can log in or create a new account.
ManageGoalsFrame
The ManageGoalsFrame class is a user interface component that allows a parent user to manage the saving goals of their child accounts.
ManageTasksFrame
The ManageTasksFrame class represents the user interface for managing tasks for a child account.
MyAccountFrame
This class represents a frame for displaying a child's account details including total savings, current balance, savings goals, and tasks.
MyGoalsFrame
A frame for managing the saving goals of a child account.
MyTasksFrame
MyTasksFrame is a JFrame that displays and manages tasks for a child account.
ParentAccount
Represents a parent's account with specific attributes and methods.
ParentPageFrame
This class represents a template frame for parent pages.
ParentUserCenterFrame
The `ParentUserCenterFrame` class is a graphical user interface component that extends the `ParentPageFrame` class.
RegistrationFrame
A registration frame for creating new user accounts.
SaveGoalsFrame
The SaveGoalsFrame class provides a user interface for saving money into a child's savings goals.
SavingGoal
Represents a saving goal with a target amount and reward.
ShopFrame
This class represents a frame for the shop where kids can buy items.
Task
Represents a task with a name, description, reward, completion status, and due date.
TransactionHistory
Represents a transaction history record with a type, amount, category, and timestamp.
Utils
A utility class that provides common utility methods used across the application.
WithdrawalFrame
The WithdrawalFrame class provides a user interface for withdrawing money from a child's account.
